医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现 Plexin-B1 可能是治疗阿尔茨海默病的关键，可增强神经胶质细胞反应研究人员发现，Plexin-B1 在调节阿尔茨海默病斑块周围神经胶质网方面发挥着至关重要的作用，可能为针对这种蛋白质的治疗开辟新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-finds-Plexin-B1-could-be-key-to-Alzheimere28099s-treatment-enhancing-glial-cell-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Study-finds-Plexin-B1-could-be-key-to-Alzheimere28099s-treatment-enhancing-glial-cell-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b063fc4-4594-4344-99e4-058db3fcc9e9 Wed, 29 May 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Study finds Plexin-B1 could be key to Alzheimer’s treatment, enhancing glial cell response
腹痛和便血可能是早发性结直肠癌的重要危险信号该研究将腹痛和便血等关键症状确定为早发性结直肠癌的重要指标，并强调早期诊断对于提高生存率的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Abdominal-pain-and-hematochezia-could-be-crucial-red-flags-for-early-onset-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Abdominal-pain-and-hematochezia-could-be-crucial-red-flags-for-early-onset-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6e94bfd-11ab-42c7-853e-bc3f1b663714 Tue, 28 May 2024 23:57:00 -0400 Abdominal pain and hematochezia could be crucial red flags for early-onset colorectal cancer
随着人口老龄化趋势，家庭医生的门诊医疗保险程序减少家庭医生在医院外执行各种手术，并且往往在办公室进行。例子可能包括外科手术，例如切除、缝合和关节注射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Decline-in-family-phycianse28099-outPatient-Medicare-procedures-amid-aging-demographic-trends.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Decline-in-family-phycianse28099-outPatient-Medicare-procedures-amid-aging-demographic-trends.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2078b18c-d59f-4901-941f-da95d4c297a5 Tue, 28 May 2024 23:48:23 -0400 Decline in family physicians’ outpatient Medicare procedures amid aging demographic trends
SPLIT 计划：分层护理可提高腰痛治疗效果腰痛（LBP）对全世界的卫生系统提出了挑战。为了减轻持续性致残性腰痛，建议在初级保健中实施分层方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/SPLIT-program-Stratified-care-for-enhanced-outcomes-in-low-back-pain-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/SPLIT-program-Stratified-care-for-enhanced-outcomes-in-low-back-pain-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b969311-f704-4a62-ac5c-de592c3af353 Tue, 28 May 2024 23:39:00 -0400 SPLIT program: Stratified care for enhanced outcomes in low back pain management
在美国用电动校车取代旧柴油校车对健康和气候有巨大好处《美国国家科学院院刊》最近的一项研究发现，在美国用电动公交车取代旧的柴油校车可显着减少温室气体排放、死亡率和儿童哮喘病例。对健康和气候的好处超过了电动公交车较高的初始成本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Huge-health-and-climate-benefits-of-replacing-old-diesel-school-buses-with-electric-in-the-United-States。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Huge-health-and-climate-benefits-of-replacing-old-diesel-school-buses-with-electric-in-the-United-States。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5925f660-9bc4-4994-acb6-4ec9d66ee54b Tue, 28 May 2024 23:23:00 -0400 Huge health and climate benefits of replacing old diesel school buses with electric in the United States
BMI较高与青少年暴食症风险增加有关《食欲》杂志最近的一项研究发现，美国青少年中，较高的 BMI 与暴食行为发展为暴食症的风险增加相关。研究结果强调了早期筛查和干预的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Higher-BMI-linked-to-increased-risk-of-binge-eating-disorder-in-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Higher-BMI-linked-to-increased-risk-of-binge-eating-disorder-in-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db9448b5-f90a-4fec-b5b4-7cdb1f97e54b Tue, 28 May 2024 22:58:00 -0400 Higher BMI linked to increased risk of binge-eating disorder in adolescents
全新AI模型Dev-ResNet实时准确监测胚胎发育普利茅斯大学领导的研究表明，一种新的深度学习人工智能模型可以从视频中识别胚胎发育过程中发生的情况和时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-AI-model-Dev-ResNet-accurately-monitors-embryonic-development-in-real-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-AI-model-Dev-ResNet-accurately-monitors-embryonic-development-in-real-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=332700c0-3c44-4877-bb75-c1a6ff0e2b24 Tue, 28 May 2024 22:53:00 -0400 New AI model Dev-ResNet accurately monitors embryonic development in real-time
Apple 听力研究揭示了耳鸣的人口统计特征和健康影响密歇根大学开展的 Apple 听力研究中，大约 78% 的参与者都曾经历过耳鸣，即感觉到其他人听不到的声音。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Apple-Hearing-Study-sheds-light-on-tinnitus-demgraphics-and-health-impacts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Apple-Hearing-Study-sheds-light-on-tinnitus-demgraphics-and-health-impacts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d322fcf-5b87-4c60-bf10-7ef7118a7de9 Tue, 28 May 2024 22:48:00 -0400 Apple Hearing Study sheds light on tinnitus demographics and health impacts
阿尔茨海默病新药 LM11A-31 在临床试验中显示出减缓疾病进展的希望Nature Medicine 最近的一项研究发现，针对 p75 神经营养素受体的 LM11A-31 是安全的，并且有望减缓阿尔茨海默病的进展。该试验表明生物标志物显着改善，并为进一步临床研究带来潜在益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-Alzheimers-drug-LM11A-31-shows-promise-in-slowing-disease-progression-in-clinical-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/New-Alzheimers-drug-LM11A-31-shows-promise-in-slowing-disease-progression-in-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3036841-e909-4423-b319-847ded9faa16 Tue, 28 May 2024 22:48:00 -0400 New Alzheimer's drug LM11A-31 shows promise in slowing disease progression in clinical trial
研究发现纹身与恶性淋巴瘤风险增加有关eClinicalMedicine 最近的一项研究表明，接触纹身墨水会使恶性淋巴瘤（尤其是 B 细胞亚型）的风险增加 21%。纹身墨水和激光去除可能在淋巴瘤的发展中发挥重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Tattoos-linked-to-higher-risk-of-malignant-lymphoma-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240528/Tattoos-linked-to-higher-risk-of-malignant-lymphoma-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22ea396b-fdea-4801-8ae0-3e0e071e0eeb Tue, 28 May 2024 22:20:00 -0400 Tattoos linked to higher risk of malignant lymphoma, study finds
